Modeling and Optimization of Complex Buildings for Healthy Indoor Environments

Pollutant Controling results

We compare three control policies here: (1) Conservative policy (2) rule-basec control policy (3) Neural network policy.
Total time 300s: there is pollutant resouce at 0-60s, 120-180s, 240-300s.

Conservative policy (top): velocity field (left), Pollutant concentration (right). Rule-based policy (middle). NN policy (bottom)
